Name: Literary Series
Description: A literary series is any series of written works (books, plays, stories, poems, essays, etc.). Examples of things that could use this type include: novels or stories that share a setting or characters; a sonnet cycle; articles or essays published in a recurring column; a series of yearly anthologies.

Properties.Name: Author(s)
Properties.Description: Authors who have written books or stories in this series.

Properties.Name: Part of Series
Properties.Description: If this series is a sub-series of a larger series, the larger series are listed here.
